EXT_DESCRIPTION.message: Magnet keeps your workspace tidy by automatically tiling your windows.

WELCOME_MESSAGE.message: Thanks for installing Magnet, the automatic window tiling extension. To get started:

TUTORIAL_STEP_1.message: Pin the extension icon and click it to enable or disable tiling or use the keyboard shortcut $shortcut$.

TUTORIAL_STEP_2.message: When you create new windows, Magnet will automatically arrange them in perfect tiles.

TUTORIAL_STEP_3.message: Right-click the extension icon for preferences.
